column1: You guys better update your resumes just like Im doing.
Yeah but Michael, what if they downsize here?
Two fifteenths, that fraction doesnt make any sense.
OK, Michael, um... Both my parents were born in Mexico.
And, uh, they moved to the United Sates a year before I was born. So I grew up in the United States.
What connotations, Michael? You meant something.
He literally wont come out of his office.
Michael, can I talk to you?
I dont know, Kevin. This is important. I dont want...  There he is.
Uh, Im sorry to bother you.
My nephew is involved with, um, a charity for cerebral palsy, and I was wondering if maybe youd like to... you know... if...
Well, thats what a walk-a-thon is.
It says it right on the sheet. Look, look at the sheet. It says, "However many dollars per mile."
I just think its kind of cheap to un-donate money to a charity.
I can help out, if you need me.
What time do we have to come in?
